summary: The function sets up the platform for ANEL PwrCtrl switches in Home Assistant. It validates the configuration, extracts connection parameters (host, username, password, ports), and creates PwrCtrlSwitch instances for each device defined in the configuration. These switch entities are then added to Home Assistant via the add_entities callback.
business_intent: To initialize and register ANEL PwrCtrl switch devices within Home Assistant, enabling them to be controlled and monitored through the platform.
